column3: ACK, if this is meant to only fix the macos build.
ACK dc4923a once Travis is happy (linter failure, should go away after rebase, see #14579)

utACK dc4923a

Relevant IRC discussion, on wether to wait for 0.17.1 or do a quick 0.17.0.1 release is [here](https://botbot.me/freenode/bitcoin-core-dev/2018-10-25/?msg=105732007&page=5). 
Consensus seems to be that a 0.17.0.1 release is preferred, there are still quite a few outstanding PRs before 0.17.1 would be done.

The linter "failure" can be fixed by rebaseing on the 0.17 branch
